# firewallamsp_targetlist (Resource)

Target List for domain blocking rules



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `list` (List of String) List of URLs to block
- `name` (String) Target List Name
- `owner` (String) GID of Firewall Box or global for MSP

### Optional

- `note` (String) Target List Note

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier
- `last_updated` (String)
